section.title: uac.reg_dump
section.para: Dump the contents of user registrations table.

section.title: uac.reg_info
section.para: Return the details of registration for a particular record.

section.title: uac.reg_enable
section.para: Enable registration for a particular record.

section.title: uac.reg_disable
section.para: Disable registration for a particular record.
